TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapMessage extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示特定 的 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应中的数据。

span.span: Represents the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response at a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的主要用途是针对 soap 扩展, 表示 soap 请求或 soap 响应中的数据。The primary use of the class is for SOAP extensions, representing the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response. 调用方法时 , 会在每个中接收。 When the method is called, a receives a at each . 这取决于特定的 SOAP 扩展, 以选择如何处理。It is up to the particular SOAP extension to choose how to process the . 常见 SOAP 扩展包括加密和压缩。Common SOAP extensions include encryption and compression. 可以将 SOAP 扩展应用到使用 ASP.NET 或 XML Web service 客户端创建的 XML Web service 方法。SOAP extensions can be applied to either or both an XML Web service method created using ASP.NET or an XML Web service client. 将 SOAP 扩展应用到 XML Web service 方法时, 该方法将接收从派生的实例。When a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service method, the method receives an instance of , which derives from . 同样, 将 SOAP 扩展应用于 XML Web service 的客户端时, 将接收的实例。Likewise, when a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service client, receives an instance of . ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/CPP/SoapMessage.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/CS/soapmessage.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/VB/soapmessage.vb#1)]

The contents of the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Soap 扩展可以设置属性以提供有关 SOAP 消息编码的补充信息, 而无需更改`Content-Type` HTTP 标头中表示的媒体类型。A SOAP extension can set the property to provide supplementary information about the encoding of a SOAP message without changing the media type as expressed in the `Content-Type` HTTP header.

exception.span: 当前 为 或 阶段。

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，断言当前 为可以使用 in 参数的阶段。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current is a stage where in parameters are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 XML Web service 客户端和 XML Web service 方法, 断言阶段是不同的。The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods. 在阶段中反序列化 SOAP 请求后, 可以使用 XML Web service 方法的 in 参数。An XML Web service method's in parameters are available after the SOAP request is deserialized in the stage. 对于 XML Web service 客户端, 在阶段的 SOAP 请求序列化过程之前, in 参数可用。For an XML Web service client, the in parameters are available prior to the SOAP request serialization process in the stage. 可以在任何过程中调用, 但是, 如果 in 参数不可用, 则会引发。 can be called during any , however an is thrown when in parameters are not available.

span.span: In parameters are not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnsureOutStage() cil managed

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，断言当前 阶段是不可以使用 out 参数的阶段。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current stage is a stage where out parameters are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 XML Web service 客户端和 XML Web service 方法, 断言阶段是不同的。The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods. 在阶段中执行 SOAP 响应序列化过程之前, 可以使用 XML Web service 方法的 out 参数。An XML Web service method's out parameters are available prior to the SOAP response serialization process in the stage. 在 XML Web service 客户端中, out 参数在阶段中的 SOAP 响应反序列化过程之后可用。In an XML Web service client, the out parameters are available after the SOAP response deserialization process in the stage. 可以在任何过程中调用, 但当 out 参数不可用时, 将引发。 can be called during any , however an is thrown when out parameters are not available.

span.span: Out parameters are not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 标头是 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应的可选部分。SOAP headers are an optional portion of a SOAP request or SOAP response. 有关在使用 ASP.NET 的 XML Web services 及其客户端创建的 SOAP 标头的详细信息, 请参阅类。For more details on using SOAP headers in XML Web services created using ASP.NET and their clients, see the class. 尽管可以在任何阶段访问 属性,但它仅在和阶段中填充了SOAP标头信息。Although the property can be accessed at any stage, it is only populated with the SOAP header information in the and stages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于, 该属性保证在阶段后有效。 For a , the property is guaranteed to be valid after the stage. 在该阶段中, 属性可用, 但 soap 消息尚未完全处理并且可能改变 soap 消息内容的 soap 扩展未运行。In the stage the property is available, however the SOAP message has not been completely processed and SOAP extensions that may alter the contents of the SOAP message have not run.

summary.span: 获取以 形式表示 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应的数据。

A read-only instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于检查表示 soap 请求或 soap 响应的数据的 soap 扩展, 如日志记录 SOAP 扩展, 可以使用`Stream`属性查看每个数据的数据。SOAP extensions that inspect the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as a logging SOAP extension, can use the `Stream` property to view the data at each . 用于修改表示 soap 请求或 soap 响应的数据 (如加密或压缩 soap 扩展) 的 SOAP 扩展应通过传递到的方法来实现此目的。SOAP extensions that modify the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as encryption or compression SOAP extensions, should do so with the passed into the method of . 传递到 的属性是只读的。The property of passed into is read-only. 有关修改表示 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应的数据的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on modifying the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, see . ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapMessage_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage_Headers/CPP/SoapMessage_Headers.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessage_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage_Headers/CS/soapmessage_headers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SoapMessage_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage_Headers/VB/soapmessage_headers.vb#2)]
